name: Basic Stealth
description:
This is my first game ever, heavily reliant on Unity's FPS tutorial. Don't expect anything special. I was mainly focusing on level design, as I am planning to learn more about coding and modeling in the future. Thanks for taking a look!

Also, P.S: The window is very small. Again, I have no idea what I'm doing, so sorry about that.

P.P.S: The music in the walkthrough is not in the actual game.
